import React from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import './header.scss' import { connect } from 'react-redux' import { auth } from '../../firebase/firebase.util' const Header = ({ currentUser }) => (
HOME
SHOP CONTACT { currentUser ?
auth.signOut()}>SIGN OUT
: SIGN IN }
) const mapStateToProps = (state) = ({ currentUser: state.user.currentUser }) export default connect()(Header)
